name: 5View Packet Capture File
summary: Learn about .5VW files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: 5VW files are typically created by Wireshark (formerly Ethereal), a free program used for network analysis. Wireshark is available for Mac, Windows, and Linux platforms. Professors and students often use the software for studying data communications.
NOTE: Accellent was acquired by InfoVista in 2007.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
